La verdad es un buen juego pero lo arruina los crasheos random y también la mala configuración de botones y al cambiarlos se desconfiguran solos de repente y si lo juegas con control, el juego te pone a pantalla dividida (unas veces si otras veces no) como si le hubieras dado el botón de START para activar el segundo jugador.

185392298.review:
O sistema de combate do jogo é genuinamente muito bom, principalmente para um jogo da série LEGO. Também adorei as mecânicas de "parkour ninja" para se movimentar pelos locais. 

Mas meu deus do céu, as pausas longas pra ganhar uma habilidade nova sempre que aumenta o nível são muito constantes e tiram o jogador da imersão facilmente. Além da quantidade massiva de cutscenes, entendo que é o jogo do filme, mas não precisa ter uma cutscene pra todo e qualquer coisinha que acontece.

185366655.review:
As vezes se torna massante e é muito colorido, mas o sistema de combate é muito legal.

Poderia durar mais algumas horas de jogo, muito curto.

Recomendo!

I got to phase 2 of the boss fight and it crashed, again.  And I'm not the only person with this issue.  If this gets fixed, or if you can work around the crash, then the game is fun, but yeah, as of now, it's an uninstall.

184958871.review:
[u]I got it from my friend when it was on [b]christmas sale.[/b][/u]
[h3]Is it worth the full price?[/h3]
[h2][spoiler]Heck no.[/spoiler][/h2]

My first 20 minutes were great, everything was working etc. 
[i]Then[/i] it kept crashing on the first boss fight.
[h3]Did I fix it?[/h3]
[h2]yes.[/h2]
[h1]How?[/h1]
[spoiler]I DONT KNOW I JUST NERFED ALL THE SETTINGS AND THEN I CHANGED ALL THE SETTINGS TO MAX AND THEN EVERYTHING WORKED SMOOTHLY FOR THE WHOLE GAME[/spoiler]
[hr][/hr]
Overall the game is fun to play but the story is... Meh, it kinda follows the movie but also it has like its own storyline and then it looks stupid when they do one thing in the game cutscene and then they show movie scene where they do something else.

[strike]To sum up or something[/strike]
If you [b]LOVE[/b] Ninjago [spoiler]like me uwu[/spoiler] then you should buy it [u](ON A SALE OFC)[/u].
I really enojyed playing it after completing the story, Collecting characters from the Ninjago Series was fun.
Also there are "dojos" and they are just themed battles. [spoiler]For example: Serpetines (Final boss: Pythor), Sky Pirates (Final boss: Nadakhan)[/spoiler]

[b]Thank you for reading and have a good daynight![/b]

184950579.review:
The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game – это увлекательное и захватывающее приключение, которое порадует как поклонников LEGO, так и любителей милых игр с элементами экшена. 

Прежде всего, игра радует своим ярким и красочным дизайном. Графика в стиле LEGO создаёт живую атмосферу, где каждую деталь приятно рассматривать. Локации вдохновлены миром Ниндзяго и передают его дух, заставляя игрока чувствовать себя частью этой уникальной вселенной.

Геймплей в NINJAGO® динамичен и разнообразен. Игрокам предстоит управлять различными персонажами с уникальными способностями, что добавляет стратегии в прохождение. Механика боя насыщенная и увлекательная, а возможность комбинировать умения ниндзя делает сражения интересными и зрелищными.

Одним из основных плюсов игры является кооперативный режим, который позволяет играть вместе с друзьями. Это обеспечивает совместные приключения и добавляет веселья в игровой процесс. Всегда приятно объединиться с кем-то, чтобы наслаждаться игрой и преодолевать сложные задачи.

Сюжет игры основан на одноименном фильме и предлагает множество забавных моментов и неожиданных поворотов. Он отлично сочетает юмор и экшн, что делает игру привлекательной для всей семьи, включая детей и взрослых.

В заключение, The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game – это игра, которая не только развлекает, но и приносит позитивные эмоции. С её ярким миром, увлекательным геймплеем и возможностью совместной игры, она заслуживает внимания каждого, кто ищет что-то необычное и веселое.

184910346.review: I'd say that this game is a lot of fun,especially if you like games about combat or maybe adventuring too.The story was also great!Playing this game was a fun experience and I think that even more people would like it if they gave it a chance to redeem itself.

7/10
If anything for L-loyd. Garmadon deserves an Oscar.

A great game, just a short one. New mechanics special to this title work well and provide enterteiment.
I regret only that there is so little content in the game (but still not a small amout! Not enough to satisfy completly, but enough to not dissapoint ) 
Even in the arenas, which were a genius idea - there is a lack of variety that would do this game much good.

Despite its flaws, based on the fun i had and potential to visit the game again after some time for a short adventure, I think this is one of the better standalone LEGO games.

184473110.review:
[h1] The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game: Fun, but Lacks Depth [/h1]

The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game, developed by TT Games, brings the charm of LEGO games to the action-packed world of Ninjago. Based on The LEGO NINJAGO Movie, the game offers a humorous take on the film’s story, where players join Lloyd and his ninja friends to defend Ninjago City from the evil Garmadon. The game retains LEGO’s signature humor and style, making it a delightful experience for younger players and fans of the franchise.

The story follows the movie closely, with cutscenes filled with jokes and over-the-top action sequences. While entertaining, it doesn’t expand much beyond the film’s narrative, making it less engaging for those already familiar with the plot. However, the vibrant world of Ninjago City, recreated in LEGO form, is a visual treat.

Gameplay is where the title shines and falters. The combat system introduces a more dynamic style compared to traditional LEGO games, with combos and special moves giving battles more variety. Exploration is rewarding, as players can find collectibles and unlock new characters. However, the levels can feel repetitive, and the puzzles are overly simplistic, offering little challenge to older players. The camera occasionally becomes a frustration during intense sequences, disrupting the flow of the game.

Overall, The LEGO® NINJAGO® Movie Video Game is a fun, lighthearted adventure perfect for younger audiences and LEGO enthusiasts. However, its lack of depth and repetitive gameplay may leave older players wanting more.

Score: 75/100

184452553.review: Really good Lego game. I liked the characters and unique levels BUT this one race made me so mad because you need one specific character without the game telling it. So I got stuck for one hour.

184299458.review:
Luego de jugarlo por mucho tiempo y de completar todos los logros:

Es bastante fácil de terminar, así como cualquier otro título de Lego que haya jugado, ya que brinda la capacidad de ser un juego que te puedes pasar en dos o en una tarde (si de plano no tienes nada que hacer) yo me tome la cantidad de horas que dice la reseña (19 hrs aprox, pero porque yo me dedique a platinarlo desde una partida nueva, tenía una partida previa como de 8 hrs) si no me hubiera dedicado a eso o hubiera seguido con la misma partida, tal vez sería la mitad de horas o un poco más de la mitad.

El videojuego es entretenido, como cualquier otro de lego, las voces (al menos en latino) son las mismas que en el show, lo cual se agradece, los combates y el movimiento los veo más fluidos a la hora de usar un control, tiene diversos acertijos que conforme pasa el tiempo, se van haciendo más dificiles, porque te hacen pensar que para resolverlo, no se resuelve en el lado A, sino que en el lado B encontrarás las piezas para poder llegar, además, tiene varios minijuegos que van desde carreras a contra tiempo como batallas de arena de hasta 4 jugadores, así como un amplio catalogo de personajes que podrás ir desbloqueando luego de superar retos (101 personajes que salen alrededor de la serie) además que puedes personalizar 8 o 9 personajes.

Podría extenderme, pero lo dejare con lo siguiente:
Si no te gustan los juegos de lego donde los personajes hablan (he visto varios debates en internet acerca de si los juegos de Lego van con/sin voz, por eso lo digo), entonces no te lo compres, pero si no te importa, adelante.

183993864.review:
story takes about 6 hours, give or take, to finish. most of the remaining gameplay is just quests and collecting stuff so if you're not into that type of game, then this one's not it.

there's a bit more context to some scenes in the movie here, so that was a nice touch, and i thought the jokes were funny. controls on keyboards are a bit wonky and can take time to get used to.

if you're into ninjago and the game is on a huge sale, then i'd say go for it
